column1: // This file contains test for which dartagnan gives a different result than herd and thus we skip them in the CI
// For each of them there should be a proper explanation of why the results of both tools differ

// sb (po) is different for C11 than hardware models. In particular it is not a total order (due to C11 not guaranteeing the evaluation order of function parameters). See https://github.com/herd/herdtools7/issues/394 for a discussion
// The read of an acquire CAS is tagged as ACQ only if the CAS success. Since we don't yet support dynamic tagging
